thread.section_title: Room Mate Grace - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Boutique experience
thread.title_full: Boutique experience - Review of Room Mate Grace, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Susan C
title: Boutique experience
text: The Room Mate Grace is a jewel in Times Square. While it does not have the extra amenities a larger hotel chain can offer a visitor, it does provide excellent service and accommodations. You are able to avoid the bustle while close to the action of Times Square. We will definitely stay here again and will look at their other locations around the world.
